channel.title: How do i make a item for mods/admin/owner
channel.description: hi all, my server is a pickup server but i still want some items for staff, so how can i make it that if some 1 else tries to weild it it says no or something. for e.g i wanted to make ADMIN crown for only admin but some normal players have started to wear it these days. thanks!

item.title: How do i make a item for mods/admin/owner
item.dc:creator: @yash yash
item.description:
@yash wrote:

[quote=“The Soul, post:4, topic:265565”][quote author=yash link=topic=350586.msg2693303#msg2693303 date=1236103694]

Edit your wear method.
[/quote][quote author=The Soul link=topic=350586.msg2693301#msg2693301 date=1236103635]
Edit your wear method.

how do i do that :o is it in my client or the source?
[/quote]

It’s server sided, so your server. In your client class, find - public boolean wear[/quote]

can u explain it in like some detail please im not a great coder, well thanks anyway…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 03, 2009, 12:53:56 pm[/size][hr]still need help :(… i dont get it .[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 04, 2009, 10:33:53 am[/size][hr]bump… soz but still need help

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a item for mods/admin/owner

item.title: How do i make a item for mods/admin/owner
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“yash, post:3, topic:265565”][quote author=The Soul link=topic=350586.msg2693301#msg2693301 date=1236103635]
Edit your wear method.
[/quote][quote author=The Soul link=topic=350586.msg2693301#msg2693301 date=1236103635]
Edit your wear method.
[/quote]

how do i do that :o is it in my client or the source?[/quote]

It’s server sided, so your server. In your client class, find - public boolean wear
